name: Their is a game
description:
Their is a game is a point and click action/mini game.

A game which has trouble getting started.

Features :

  • Unique game where you play while and with loading
  • Mini-game mechanics to make the game fun and dynamic
  • 2D Cartoon universe which reinforces the comic and playful aspect of the game

This game was made in 3 weeks by 2 students from e-artsup Paris in their 3rd Year of Game Art and Creative Coding, during a GameJam.

The goal was to make a game with the theme "it’s not supposed to do that".

GAME ARTISTS :

Kevin NGUYEN (2D assets , UI, Animation)

CREATIVE CODING :

Andy REMY (Programming, Game Design, Sound Design)

Special mention to destroyer 2004 for the music.
